name: Beelieve in yourself
description:
--CONTROLS--

W (or Up arrow key) for moving forward and A-D (Left-Right arrow keys) to rotate.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

In this short game made for "Ludum Dare 46 ~ Keep It Alive", you control the last bee on Earth.

As a bee, you can't do much. Just do what a bee would do, while avoiding being killed, of course.

Everything made by me in  72 hours.
